title: I can't hear
creator_credit: Millbank Films, Peter Griffiths and Peter Rawson
brief_description: Arthur Freeman is a wood machinist in a medium sized industrial firm. Over the years he has, whenever possible, dodged the wearing of ear protection. He is now suffering from noise induced hearing loss. A fictionalised drama.
creator_credit_for_label: Millbank Films, Peter Griffiths and Peter Rawson
